name: Dusty Droids
description: Dirty Droids is a social deduction game that is resolved with violence rather than voting. There are three sides, the Cowboys the Robots and the Renegades, all three want the other sides destroyed. Players take turns shooting each other while trying to gather evidence on who could be who. A quick paced game with upgradeable weapons, protective barrels, playable characters and changing allegiances with many  trust issues. Dirty Droids is fun for all ages and simple to learn
